import React from 'react'; const AddStudentForm = ({ newStudent, setNewStudent, handleAddStudent }) => (

Add New Student

setNewStudent({ ...newStudent, name: e.target.value })} className="border p-3 rounded-lg w-full focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary transition-all" />
setNewStudent({ ...newStudent, class: e.target.value })} className="border p-3 rounded-lg w-full focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary transition-all" />
setNewStudent({ ...newStudent, studentId: e.target.value })} className="border p-3 rounded-lg w-full focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary transition-all" />
); export default AddStudentForm;
